DOC.detailed_description: Study entry require diagnosis low intermediate ( INT-1 ) risk MDS per International Prognostic Scoring System ( IPSS ) criteria serum ferritin ≥ 1000 ng/mL . Patients must least 30 prior red blood cell transfusion . Deferasirox administer initial dose 20 mg/kg orally per day . Patient transfusion history least three complete blood count ( CBC ) value must available 12 week prior study registration patient MDS chronic iron overload blood transfusion .
